entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
